databaseConfig.sql:
select MS_YUSO_ITEM.MS_YUSO_ITEM_ID , MS_YUSO_ITEM.YUSO_ITEM_CODE , MS_YUSO_ITEM.YUSO_ITEM_NAME , MS_YUSO_ITEM.SENSHU_CODE , MS_YUSO_ITEM.SENSHU_NAME , MS_YUSO_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , MS_YUSO_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_YUSO_ITEM.TS , MS_YUSO_ITEM.DELETE_FLAG , MS_YUSO_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , MS_YUSO_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , MS_YUSO_ITEM.DATA_NO , MS_YUSO_ITEM.USER_KEY
from MS_YUSO_ITEM where DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_YUSO_ITEM ( MS_YUSO_ITEM_ID , YUSO_ITEM_CODE , YUSO_ITEM_NAME , SENSHU_CODE , SENSHU_NAME , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , USER_KEY ) VALUES ( nextval('SEQ_MS_YUSO_ITEM_ID'), :YUSO_ITEM_CODE , :YUSO_ITEM_NAME , :SENSHU_CODE , :SENSHU_NAME , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , 0 , 0 , :VESSEL_ID , :USER_KEY )

UPDATE MS_YUSO_ITEM SET YUSO_ITEM_CODE = :YUSO_ITEM_CODE, YUSO_ITEM_NAME = :YUSO_ITEM_NAME, SENSHU_CODE = :SENSHU_CODE, SENSHU_NAME = :SENSHU_NAME, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID
WHERE MS_YUSO_ITEM_ID = :MS_YUSO_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS
